name: Ballerina Nightmare
description:
FULLSCREEN FOR BEST PERFORMANCE

Me and my friends were playing some skribbl.io when one of us, a man named Eliot, drew this rather terrifying drawing of a ballerina. We joked about how it looked nightmare inducing, and something you'd see in a low budget horror game. Thus, I created a low budget horror game with the nightmare ballerina in.

Created in a day. Used some free assets (walls and floors), and free ambient sound. Rest of the assets created by me.
